text:
Straightforward convenience store and pharmacy if you need anything last minute. They're located on the ground floor of the Gleneagles Medical Centre side of things, next to the lift lobby.

The experience can get a little congested, given how it's set up along a tiny narrow walkway. That said, get your thing, and leave.

If you need gifts for visiting someone at the hospital, and you don't have time, this works as an option to consider.
For convenience I like to buy some stuff after seeing my doctors. But have to navigate pass those promoters who can be rather persistent!
Only 1 guardian staff in store doing cashier, attending to enquiries and receiving goods from suppliers.
Here is a guardian store and has all the medical stuff. Pharmacy is also available
